name: XCTCPUMetric
desc: A metric to record information about CPU activity during a performance test.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a CPU metric that records data for the current process.

items.name: init(application: XCUIApplication)
items.desc: Creates a CPU metric that records data for the requested app.

items.name: init(limitingToCurrentThread: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a CPU metric that optionally records data only for the current thread.
